job.name: Write read HDFS
job.description: A workflow to submit a Spark job from a docker container, to write and read Persons from/to HDFS

script.code: container_id="$(docker run --net=$variables_network -di activeeon/hdfs-spark:latest /bin/sh -c 'bash')" docker exec $container_id /bin/sh -c 'spark-submit --deploy-mode client --class jobs.MapR_fs_job --deploy-mode client --num-executors 1 --driver-memory 50m --executor-cores 2 --queue default --master '$variables_spark_master_url' $USR_HOME/MapR_fs_job-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar '$variables_hdfs_directory
